meanings.sent1: The team members coexerted their strength to lift the heavy box.
meanings.sent2: The students decided to coexert their ideas to create a successful project.
meanings.sent3: The ants coexerted their efforts to carry the food back to their nest.

meanings.definition: To work together in a coordinated effort
meanings.sent1: The firefighters coexerted to put out the blazing fire.
meanings.sent2: The volunteers coexerted to clean up the park after the event.
meanings.sent3: The chefs coexerted in the kitchen to prepare a delicious meal.
meanings.sent4: The birds coexerted in the sky to form intricate patterns during migration.
meanings.sent5: The friends coexerted to organize a surprise party for their friend.
